adrFormatAddress: 154 W 18th St Studio 2A, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
My family has a valuable heirloom that we wanted to have brought back to its original life. As a sentimental piece, we made sure to find the BEST restoration work to ensure the safety of our painting. When we spoke with LB Studio, Doreen was so reassuring and helpful. We dropped off the painting and were impressed with the facilities, especially after speaking with David and Marie. We’re so grateful for their work as our delicate heirloom has been restored beyond my expectations!

The tear in the painting was taken care of, and is now completely invisible. The true coloring of the painting, which I had never seen before, was bright and radiant. The piece has a whole new life! I will be bringing back all my paintings to LB Studio to be restored - they’re simply the best in town.

originalText.text: Over the decades of working with Luca and his studio, I have found their work to be exemplary and second-to-none in NYC.  Whether of Tribal, Modern, or Contemporary, their work has been thoughtful, thorough, and on the mark, never too much, never too little, and always respecting the art first and their hands and eyes complementary.  Most importantly, they have made the right judgment calls when deciding what and how to apply their gifts to achieve the highest level of conservation.

text.text: Over the decades of working with Luca and his studio, I have found their work to be exemplary and second-to-none in NYC.  Whether of Tribal, Modern, or Contemporary, their work has been thoughtful, thorough, and on the mark, never too much, never too little, and always respecting the art first and their hands and eyes complementary.  Most importantly, they have made the right judgment calls when deciding what and how to apply their gifts to achieve the highest level of conservation.

originalText.text: The Bonetti studio team are reliable, knowledgeable, well-respected industry colleagues. Their expertise and guidance is invaluable and they are able to provide efficient feedback in moments that are time sensitive. The preferred conservation studio for many noteworthy studios and collectors, the Bonetti team lends additional confidence on any condition inspection, proposal & treatment project on which they participate. David and his colleagues are incredibly flexible and communicate clearly. Advice is honed and focused with attention to the priorities of the project without being heavy-handed in their interventions. The quality of the results in relation to the cost is also very competitive for the level of expertise they bring to the table.

originalText.text: We have had the pleasure of working with the Luca Bonetti Art Conservation studio for several paintings.  Their work restoring and cleaning is impeccable.They brought each piece to life after they cleaned and repaired.  They are great communicators, flexible and a pleasure to work with. All their work is documented in detail.  We can recommend without reservation.

All their work is documented in detail.  We can recommend without reservation.

originalText.text: Luca Bonetti, Corp was an absolute amazing experience!  They handled all of my art with care, love and attention. They went above and beyond to meticulously clean damaged art, fix framing and art that seemingly was unfixable. I cannot say enough about Luca, David the whole staff there.
